content.text: I'm a clumsy person. I've broken quite a few things because of it.
I'm not superstitious, but I've always been curious about fortune tellers.
I live in the great white north, Portland, Oregon.
I live with my three cats.
I have a lot of happy memories playing with my siblings.
I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.
I'm proud of my work ethic and dedication to my craft.
I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests.
I'm a dancer on a competitive dance team.
I'm single and I'm not really interested in dating right now.
It sounds like we both have a lot of interesting hobbies.
I think so too! It's always fun to meet new people and learn about their interests.
I agree! I'm glad we had this chat.
Me too! I hope we can talk again soon.
